title: Miguxês
content: Miguxês (Portuguese pronunciation: [miɡuˈʃes] or [miɣuˈʃeʃ]), also known in Portugal as pita talk or pita script (pronounced [ˈpitɐ]), is an Internet slang of the Portuguese language, commonly used by mostly Brazilian teenagers on the Internet and other electronic media, such as messages written on cell phones.
